attributes.action: Reduce speed on Country roads in South Wales to 30mph
attributes.additional_details:
Many issues have been reported to the local authority and the local police but it feels like they are waiting for a disaster to happen before taking any action
If the speed limit was reduced to 30 I believe this would be of great benefit to all Horse Riders, Walkers, Dog Walkers and the General Public
Groeswen to Abertridwr road in Caerphilly South Wales are where I am situated
attributes.background: I am hoping that parliament can do something before more lives are lost.  We try as much as possible to horse ride on country roads to avoid excess traffic but now this is becoming more difficult  dangerous and extremely scary, 60mph through lanes is way to fast.

rejection.details:
Local speed limits on roads are set by local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.  

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for action to improve facilities for horse riding in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548159.
